ResearchProjectDef.label: oil extraction
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks techniques for extracting oils from a variety of plants and seeds, enabling the production of valuable artisan oils.

ResearchProjectDef.label: artisan dairy processing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks techniques for transforming raw milk into a variety of dairy products, such as yogurt, cream, and condensed milk.

ResearchProjectDef.label: vinegar brewing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the knowledge of fermenting various produce into vinegar.
